name: devopera-dopuppetmaster
author: (c) Alex Stanhope, Devopera.com
summary: Self-contained, self-puppetting puppetmaster installation and configuration module
description:
The Puppetmaster is the central tenet of a puppet infrastructure.  
This Devopera puppet module configures a puppetmaster that is itself puppetable, uses stored configs in PuppetDB and optionally links to Nagios for monitoring.
